synopsis.text: Junpei, a high school student, finds a mysterious rock on his way to school one day. In class, the rock suddenly comes to life, transporting Junpei and four classmates to an animated fantasy world. There, a Sphinx appears and challenges the group with puzzles, threatening that they won't be able to return home if they can't solve them. The five students must now navigate this unfamiliar animated land, overcoming obstacles using teamwork and courage. Their bond strengthens as they support each other while tackling the Sphinx's puzzles. Ultimately, the friends must determine whether they have what it takes to outsmart the Sphinx and find their way back to the real world they left behind. This thrilling anime follows Junpei and his friends' transformative journey in a magical realm. Viewers are sure to be drawn into the enchanting animated universe while connecting with the relatable high school protagonists. With imaginative worlds to explore and high stakes riddles to solve, this anime promises exhilarating adventure and heartwarming camaraderie.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
